subject: Request for Partial Reimbursement – Invoice 3515604
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Support,

I recently received and paid invoice #3515604 from Slovak Parcel Service,
which included an additional charge of €36.90 beyond the base delivery
cost. Upon review, this amount appears to include a €30.00 cash-on-delivery
fee and applicable VAT.

As per your previous message stating that you would reimburse a portion of
any additional taxes or fees, I kindly request confirmation on whether this
qualifies for partial reimbursement.

Please find the invoice attached for your reference. Thank you for your
assistance.

Best regards,

conversations.body_text: Okay, we've processed your refund. Thank you for your information.
